column1: The list of Tesla deaths is crowd sourced (mostly from English language news articles) and almost certainly undercounts total deaths, particularly
in non English speaking geographies. If you live in a non English speaking country, please help us out by searching government databases
and local news archives. Thank you!
Special thanks to @icapulet and @paul91701736 for help in creating this site, and to @Marshmall0wpeep for much sleuthing through news stories
